#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int i,t;
    long long n,diff;
    long long *pow= new long long[100];
    pow[0]=1;
    pow[1]=2;
    for( i=2;i<62 && pow[i-1]<1000000000000000000LL;i++)
    {
        pow[i]=pow[i-1]*2; 
        
    }
    
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        for( i=0;i<61;i++)
        {
            if(pow[i]>n)
            break;
        }
        diff=pow[i]-n;
        diff=n+1-diff;
        printf("%lld\n",diff);
    }
    delete [] pow;
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
